name: Red And Blue web
description:
In this game there are two robo twins which can be controlled simultaneously and there are different types of enemies but one can only see red and other can only see blue and both of them can see violet enemy.This is a split screen game so you have to watch both the screen while playing to kill these enemies.

W,A,SD OR Arrow keys-------->Move. Space------------------------------->Jump.Left Mouse Click------------------>To kill red enemy.Right Mouse Click------------------>To kill blue enemy.Middle-Click-------------------------->To kill violet enemy.
